{
    "package_type": "Database",
    "token_limit": 4000,
    "key_findings": [
        "PostgreSQL Performance Configuration",
        "Schema Optimization Opportunities",
        "Query Pattern Analysis"
    ],
    "critical_files": [
        "/app/api/database/schema.py",
        "/app/api/database/models.py",
        "/docker-compose.yml (database service)"
    ],
    "performance_bottlenecks": [
        "Identify N+1 query patterns",
        "Implement database connection pooling",
        "Optimize large result set handling"
    ],
    "coordination_metadata": {
        "specialists": ["schema-database-expert", "performance-profiler"],
        "validation_requirements": [
            "Benchmark query performance",
            "Test connection pooling efficiency",
            "Validate schema normalization"
        ]
    }
}
